name: Old San Juan Vacation Rentals
tag_list: sharing-economy, vacation-rentals, old-san-juan, puerto-rico, vacation, travel, reviews, san-juan
overview:
We provide grand and unique apartments as vacation rentals, in the quaint old town known as Old San Juan, Puerto Rico. They are in historically-restored Spanish-Colonial style buildings. We utilize airbnb and other social network/travel sites to market the units. The apartments offer ample space for families or traveling groups, and are designed to permit the visitor to ‘make themselves at home’ within moments of arriving. Automated checkin/checkout and internet access is offered in all units. Guests are welcomed with details regarding the surroundings, things to see and do, and easy access to the hosts via cellphone and text message. As well, guests’ privacy is respected, as their rental experience includes an entire residence/apartment.

As a result of our many excellent reviews, we are in the top 10 of search results on Airbnb for Old San Juan, PR.

We appreciate opportunities to discuss market and financing.
